descriptions: I am Anirudh Kumar. I am currently working as a Software Engineer at Xoriant Solutions specialized in JavaScript Applications. I did my undergrad in CS from DIT.
I am a developer, geek and curious human besides being an OpenSource enthusiast. I have experience of delivering solutions for interesting problems from startup and industry space.
I love to cook and travel.
Attended Nasa Space App Program organized by Think Again Lab.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
descriptions: Build Micro-frontends in react, which can be used in other SPA apps, used in several projects.
Build UI components of Blueprint Design System which is used by other applications. Also, wrote test cases and improved the code coverage from 65 to 95%.
Worked on Storybook appliaction to display features and working of MFEs and UI Components.
Used react UI libraries for designing and build components for SPAs for different user roles and token based authetication.
